summary: Jester VANILLA and REGULAR model for FEMALES!!
descriptionHtml:
INSTALLATION WARNING: (Drag and Drop Data into skyrim folder)(Steamapps)

I\'ve had limited time to test this out to the full potential but there are TWO files:

File ONE:                                                            File TWO:
RECCOMENDED                                                    REGULAR

Has the VANILLA Jester Hat                                 Regular Hat (MALE MASQUERADE MAY OVER-RIDE)
Regular Chest (MAY CHANGE MALE)                      Regular Chest
Regular Gloves (MALE AS WELL)                           Regular Gloves (MALE AS WELL)
Regular Boots                                                      Regular Boots

PERSONAL NOTE: I reccomend the File Labaled (Vanilla Hat) because it looks cooler in my opinion. Although you may need to cut the hair of your girl off haha. But it looks neat and uses the Female skin-texture for it instead of the males.

the WARNING: The gloves are the males texture as well since there is no seperate Female Gloves; be warned that NPCs that are male wearing this armor may have just their gloves and (possibly the chest) retextured. Although the Female Chest is seperate.

WARNING AGAIN: I have not tested-well I have tested the Male Version and Female version out at the same time and they work FINE. No problems at all (Besides them sharing the same gloves and hat (Hat is shared if you don\'t use the vanilla file; which is why I reccomend it).

Bugs? Problems? Please let me know! I tested my ugly-ass female like 12 times. Yeah, she\'s ugly. Muwa ha ha ha! Actually I kinda like her. Damnit emotions...

If you don\'t like the skin-texture - I\'m sorry. But it works for my eye!
author: WarpAvP2
